pages.text: 43|61|Hontōni kare (īsā) wa,(shinpan no)-ji no shirushi no hitotsudearu. Dakara sono (toki) ni tsuite utagatte wa naranai. Soshite ware ni shitagae. Kore koso, tadashī michidearu.
43|62|Akuma o shite, anata gata o (arrā no michi kara) samatage sasete wa naranai. Hontōni kare wa, anata gata no kōzen no tekidearu.

43|63|Īsā ga samazamana meishō o motte yattekita toki itta. `Hontōni watashi wa, eichi o anata gata ni motarashi, anata gataga ronsō suru koto no, tashō no bubun o anata gata no tame ni, tokiakasu tamedearu. Sorede arrā o osore, watashi ni shitagae.
43|64|Hontōni arrā koso wa watashi no omodeari, mata anata gata no omode ara reru. Kare ni tsukae nasai. Kore koso, tadashī michidearu.'
43|65|Daga kare-ra no ma no shoha wa, naka tagai shita. Korera aku o okonau mono koso wazawaidearu. Kunō no hi no chōbatsu no tame ni.
43|66|Kare-ra wa, tada matte iru no ka. Kare-ra ga ishiki shinai toki ni, totsuzen yattekuru (shinpan no) toki o.
43|67|Sonohi,-nushi o osoreru mono o nozoite wa,(shitashī) tomo mo tagaini teki to narou.
43|68|Waga shimo be yo, sonohi anata gata ni wa osore mo naku, mata urei mo nai.
43|69|Waga shirushi o shinjite,(ware no ishi ni) fukujū, kie shite ita mono yo,
43|70|anata gata, soshite anata gata no haigūsha mo kanki no naka ni rakuen ni ire.'

43|71|Kare-ra ni wa kazukazu no kogane no sara ya hai ga, tsugitsugini mawasa re (rakuen no) nakaniha kakuji no nozomu mono, mata me o yorokobasu mono ga arou. Anata gata wa eien ni soko ni sumu nodearu.
43|72|Kore ga anata gata no okonatta koto ni taishi, anata gata ni tsuga se rareta rakuendearu.
43|73|Soko ni wa anata gata no tame ni hōfuna kajitsu ga ari, soreni anata gata wa manzoku suru.
